name: bookshelf-flow
description: flow declarations for flow with tool to create model files from the db schema

scripts.create-models: rm -f test/models/* && mkdir -p test/models && babel-node src/bin.js --connection postgresql://localhost/bookshelf-flow --tables users --out test/models --bookshelf '../bookshelf'
scripts.migrate: babel-node node_modules/.bin/knex --knexfile test/knexfile.js migrate:latest && npm run create-models
